title: Donald Trump claims he is securing the oil in Syria for the US - here's the reality
text:
Sitting at the mahogany table that dominates the White House’s Cabinet Room this week, Donald Trump made an unexpected pronouncement on Syria. “We've secured the oil,” he said. “We want to keep the oil.”

Mr Trump’s suggestion that the US somehow plans to seize Syria’s oil supplies sent ripples of confusion through the American government and around the world.

Friends and foes alike struggled to understand if the president was actually serious and, if he was, how a limited force of US troops could extract oil amid the chaos unfolding in Syria.

Senior US officials insist Mr Trump was merely saying the US should safeguard the oil to keep it from benefiting American enemies like the Islamic State...
description: Sitting at the mahogany table that dominates the White House’s Cabinet Room this week, Donald Trump made an unexpected pronouncement on Syria.
